body_html:
Ran a quick test:

python --version
Python 3.4.3+

Relevant details:

python -c "import tensorflow; print(tensorflow.__version__)"
0.9.0rc0

Got the following:

step 19800, training accuracy 0.9
step 19900, training accuracy 0.88
test accuracy 0.9071

Changing the learning rate to (1e-3):

step 19800, training accuracy 0.96
step 19900, training accuracy 1
test accuracy 0.9623

Which looks a little better.

body:
Ran a quick test:

```
python --version
Python 3.4.3+
```

Relevant details:

```
python -c "import tensorflow; print(tensorflow.__version__)"
0.9.0rc0
```

Got the following:

```
step 19800, training accuracy 0.9
step 19900, training accuracy 0.88
test accuracy 0.9071
```

Changing the learning rate to (1e-3):

```
step 19800, training accuracy 0.96
step 19900, training accuracy 1
test accuracy 0.9623
```

Which looks a little better.
